Black is creating space for me to get in behind the g & h pawns and attack his king side.
moves.16. g3: Need a retreat for my bishop.
moves.20. Nxc5: Might as well take a pawn down with me.
moves.20... Nxc5 21. Qe3: Time to throw caution into the wind
moves.22... dxe5 23. Ba5: Need to get black's Q away from the action
moves.24... Bxd6: Obliges once more.   Black seems to have dropped his guard being so many pieces ahead.
moves.29. Rf5: Double attack on the knight and threaten Rg5 Kf8, Qd6 Ke8, Re5#
moves.30. Qxc5: But has to lose the knight and it's just a case of maintaining the pressure from here with black's king vulnerable to repeated checking
moves.30... Qd2 31. Rg5+ Rg6 32. Rxg6+ fxg6 33: A bit lucky maybe, but just goes to show you should never give up.
